org.talend.core.model.temp
Interface IXmlSerializable

All Known Subinterfaces:
IDesignerProcess, IMetadataConnection, IProcess
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSerializable, DefaultProcessImpl, MetadataConnection, MetadataConnectionFileImpl, Process, ProcessFileImpl
public interface IXmlSerializable

Manages XML serialization. Typically implemented by EMF.
Uses to provide xml representation of java objects.
Used by persistence framework.
$Id$

          Returns an InputStream that represents an xml file that represents object content.

Method Detail

getXmlStream

java.io.InputStream getXmlStream()
Returns an InputStream that represents an xml file that represents object content.

Stream must be close by caller after use.

Returns:
the representation of the object
Throws:
